product_name: INKEYBrighten-i Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackINKEY Brighten-i Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream is a hydrating eye-cream that helps reduce the appearance of dark circles and visibly improve under-eye brightness while instantly illuminating.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly brighten under-eyes. This lightweight, hydrating cream revives dull under-eyes to brighten instantly and over timeMica mineral blend instantly illuminates while BRIGHTENYL™ reduces the appearance of dark circles to help blur fine lines & wrinkles for a smooth base ideal for makeupKey IngredientsBRIGHTENYL™ 2%: Reduces appearance of dark circlesMica Mineral Blend 1%: Instantly illuminates, brightens and helps reduce appearance of dark circles5% GRANT-XT: Helps instantly blur the look of fine lines and wrinklesItem 2641808How To UseSuggested Use:-Can be used in your AM & PM skincare routine-After cleansing and hydrating with your chosen hydrator, gently squeeze a pea-sized amount onto the tip of your ring finger to use for both eyes then gently pat around the contours of the eyes and follow with your preferred moisturiser.-Apply SPF as the last step in your AM skincare routine.INKEY Tip:-Great as an illuminating under-eye primer before concealer or for no make-up days.IngredientsWater (Aqua, Eau), Dimethicone, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Candelilla/Jojoba/Rice Bran Polyglyceryl-3 Esters, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, 6324f21a-9a5a-4f15-8a0a-5d08edd640f1, Mica, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Polysilicone-11, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silica, Dehydroacetic Acid, Diglucosyl Gallic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Trihydroxystearin, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glucomannan.
how_to_use: Suggested Use:-Can be used in your AM & PM skincare routine-After cleansing and hydrating with your chosen hydrator, gently squeeze a pea-sized amount onto the tip of your ring finger to use for both eyes then gently pat around the contours of the eyes and follow with your preferred moisturiser.-Apply SPF as the last step in your AM skincare routine.INKEY Tip:-Great as an illuminating under-eye primer before concealer or for no make-up days.

reviews.headline: Anyone saying it's a weird texture must have a bad bottle
reviews.comments: The texture of this eye cream is just like lots of others. The people saying its gross must have a bad bottle. I'll update to include more but so far it doesnt burn, absorbs easily and does leabe a little glow so your dark circles dont look so dark.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using this product since March along with Inkley's retinol eye cream. I LIVE by the Brighten-I Eye cream, initially I started using it religiously at night, and slowly begin to use it in the morning too. I'm 20 and felt that my dark under eyes were aging me. I now use it when I feel necessary, because it has worked so well. This product has replaced my concealer on days I want to look a bit more polished. The instant illumination when applied is literally amazing. If you struggle with the same problem area like me, I highly recommend both the Brighten-I Eye Cream and Retinol Eye Cream by Inkley List. Took 5 years off of my look, GET THIS NOW!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Snatched

faceoff_negative.comments: I have repurchased this product several times over the past few years. Recently, the applicator changed and I believe the formula did too - not only is the product more difficult to apply and doesn't have a soothing effect due to the applicator going from a silver metal-like applicator to a plastic tip, but the formula has changed. The product used to have a light, nearly scentless smell but now it STINKS, and I mean noticeably. I also noticed the overall effectiveness has changed. I used to look instantly brighter and now it does not have that same instant shimmer effect. I also noticed for me personally, the new formula stings my skin, which was not the case previously. I am beyond disappointed because this was one of my favorite products especially for the incredible price point. Please consider reverting back to the old formula and applicator!
faceoff_negative.headline: Formula and Applicator Change

rollup.name: Brighten-i Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream
